name: The Shadows Awaken
description:
This is a game i challenged myself to make in 1 day, I'm pretty proud of it for the timeframe!

Basic gameplay:

Desk - a shadow will appear, click it in 10s to make it go away (E)

Window- Eyes appear in the window, Bang the window to make it leave (E)

Door - an eerie sound will play, slam the door to detract enemies (e)

Hope you enjoy, any issues you find please comment ill fix it in a future update!

Enjoy!!
